spec_data.Name: perl-MooseX-Daemonize
spec_data.Description:
Often you want to write a persistent daemon that has a pid file, and
responds appropriately to Signals. This module provides a set of basic
roles as an infrastructure to do that.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:56:23 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Role for daemonizing your Moose based application
